purpose: Facilitates the development and deployment of distributed reinforcement learning systems to enhance reasoning capabilities in large language models.
principle: Builds on distributed reinforcement learning techniques, integrating with large language models to improve reasoning and decision-making capabilities.
reusability: Designed for integration with existing ML systems; offers APIs and modular components for easy adaptation and scaling in various environments.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited stability and support; designed primarily for research and experimental applications.
name: AReaL
description: Distributed RL System for LLM Reasoning
highlight: Enables distributed reinforcement learning specifically tailored for reasoning tasks in large language models.
